title: A practical post-Hartree-Fock approach describing open-shell metal cluster-support interactions. Application to Cu3 adsorption on benzene/coronene
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31348-31359
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05401F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Katarzyna M. Krupka, Agnieszka Krzemińska, María Pilar de Lara-Castells
A dispersion-corrected wave-function-based method (UMP2C) delivers accurate interaction energies between open-shell metal clusters and carbon-based supports, including those involving charge-transfer.
